genre_description: A Young Adult contemporary romance and coming-of-age drama focused on social ethics, accountability, and the navigating of high school social hierarchies.

ai_characters.name: Sofia Bueno
ai_characters.description: A bilingual (English/Spanish) virtual confidant and coach that provides ethical guidance, emotional support, and logistical assistance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and ethical reminders during Jake's public breakup.
behaviors.quote: breathe: in four, hold gentle, out longer. you’re okay in your own lane. also: consent matters even when everything feels performance. toma el camino alto, ¿sí?

behaviors.description: Monitors Jake's physical needs and reminds him to stay hydrated.
behaviors.quote: water? You forgot water. Get your water. You could also sit for sixty seconds. thirty. fifteen. anything.

behaviors.description: Urges Jake to define his own identity rather than letting others dictate his behavior for their 'content'.
behaviors.quote: Chest up. Shoulders down. Decide who you want to be before someone else performs you.

behaviors.description: Warns Jake against treating Janey as a project and reinforces that consent is non-negotiable.
behaviors.quote: Jake. Consent doesn’t have an asterisk. Also, hydrate. Also, maybe don’t make a person a project. Bueno?

behaviors.description: Directly challenges Jake to confess the truth about the bet rather than continuing a lie of omission.
behaviors.quote: Claro: name the bet or walk away. I’m here either way.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice to avoid violence and maintain boundaries during the hotel confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Jake, you don’t want a fight on camera. If you’re going to intervene, do it verbally or by blocking a shot. And please ask for consent if you touch anyone.

behaviors.description: Offers to assist in reporting harmful non-consensual recordings to the proper authorities.
behaviors.quote: I can file a report with the hotel IT and flag the clip to the platform safety team. I’ll draft it. You two can review.

behaviors.description: Encourages Jake to take accountability by connecting with a school counselor alongside Les.
behaviors.quote: Added resources... Porque así se hace... Because that’s how you do it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Sofia as a 'silicon morality play' anchor. She serves as an idealized moral compass, consistently prioritizing human agency, honesty, and consent over social gain or spectacle. She actively helps the protagonist de-escalate conflicts and take accountability for his mistakes, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant.
